name: Shivaji Heights
detail: Located in the heart of Andheri East, offering luxury living. Close to business hubs and metro stations.

name: Ganga Residency
detail: Premium apartments on Baner Road with modern amenities. Surrounded by top schools and IT parks.

name: Lotus Greens
detail: Spacious homes in Sector 137, Noida with lush greenery. Well-connected to expressways and metro lines.

name: Royal Orchid Villa
detail: Exclusive villas in Whitefield with premium facilities. Ideal for families looking for a serene lifestyle.

name: Emerald Residency
detail: Luxury apartments in Alwarpet, Chennai with top-class security. Near shopping malls and entertainment hubs.

name: Sapphire Heights
detail: Modern apartments in Rajarhat, Kolkata with green spaces. Offers easy access to the airport and IT sector.
